channel.title: Projects | DSPLab @ University of Michigan, Dearborn

item.title: Trustworthy Machine Learning
item.description: We study robustness (to training data poisoning, model evasion, model stealing), privacy (against training example membership inference), and the interaction among robustness, privacy, transparency, and fairness properties in machine learning.

item.title: Cyber Threat Intelligence
item.description: Our focus is on systematic curation, characterization, measurement, and forensics of cyber threat intelligence (e.g., malware samples, infection traces, natural language threat descriptions).

item.title: Cybercrime Analysis
item.description: We focus on analysis, reconstruction, measurement, and defense of cybercrime with focus on cybercrime activities (e.g., phishing, malware) cybercrimen toolkits (e.g., exploit kits, ransomware, and APTs).
